subject: Noise in hydraulics dampers
description_text:
Hi I've just started using the plus x pedals. The "hydraulics" dampers in all of the pedals make a lot of squishing noise when pressure is applied. Doesn't sound right.


Please advise if it can be remedied.

Thanks
Jo

conversations.body_text: Hi Joel Chen,  Our product uses a hydraulic damper filled with liquid, not a low-cost gas spring. So, hearing a liquid flow sound during operation is completely normal and nothing to worry about.Â
